name: MeiMeiDance
description:
MeiMeiDance is a sports game based on SteamVR.The full support of the VR device allows you to enter the world of different dimensions.Zero distance contact dancer. View dancing from multiple perspectives.Learn dancing with her.Combined with lighting, stage, music, effects, to show you the beautiful dance.Support multiple different styles of dance.If you like to watch MMD, then you must not miss this game.

Simple interaction with dancers
Dancing included (aerobics, home dance, sexy dance)
Play speed adjustment
Real-time physical simulation
HTCvive only
